entry.title: Catching some air at the Northwest Skateboarders' Skate Jam
entry.summary: The repetition of the sound of wheels smacking on concrete is almost satisfying. They glide along metal rails, taking a short break to catch some air, landing back on the ground with a demanding force. It was a sound that…

entry.title: October is fire prevention month
entry.summary: OREGON — Each year, October is designated as Fire Prevention Month in Oregon, with four weeks dedicated to learning about fire safety. This year's theme for Fire Prevention Month is "Cooking Safety Starts with You. Pay Attention to Fire Prevention."

entry.title: Pink Premier: Kandi Kirby to model at 23rd Annual Tea and Fashion Show
entry.summary: Kandi Kirby, 52, discovered a lump on her breast in July 2021, but from the mammogram, they deemed it a benign cyst. Five months later, the pain in her armpit was still prevalent.
